document.discussion_title: Internet reacts to murky green water in Rio’s diving pool | WWLP.com
document.topic_text: Internet reacts to murky green water in Rio’s diving pool Internet reacts to murky green water NBC Olympics.com Published: Click to share on Pinterest (Opens in new window) Rio officials were clear that the murky green waters of the Maria Lenk Aquatics Center diving pool, which are said to be caused by a proliferation of algae, are completely safe for divers. But that isn’t stopping both brands and individuals from having a little fun on the Internet. Here is a collection of reactions from around the World Wide Web… Share this:

But that isn’t stopping both brands and individuals from having a little fun on the Internet. Here is a collection of reactions from around the World Wide Web… Share this:
